articles.content:
Simultaneous rallies proclaimed in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The headquarters of the movement for redressing Japanese textbooks and the world council of the Korean nation's movement for helping each other held a ceremony for proclaiming simultaneous rallies in the whole world for peace and friendship in Seoul on May 24, Seoul-based radio no. 1 reported.
 At the ceremony the organizations decided to form a branch of the international campaign for redressing Japanese textbooks and launch a campaign.    
 It was also decided that compatriots should hold simultaneous rallies in front of the Japanese embassies in over 130 countries on June 12.
